channel_menu_mall_tip2: User can redeem points for goods
channel_menu_campaign_tip1: Consume points to have a lucky draw
product_number_tip: A max of 20 characters allowed, and goods ID must be unique.
product_name_tip: Goods name must be 4-30 characters long
product_piclib_tip: Dimensions suggested: 500px * 900px; max file size allowed: 5M; and max number of images allowed: 10
product_no_category_tip: No category. You can add categories and properties in Product Setting
product_pic_delete: Are you sure to delete this picture?
product_promotion_statistics_time_select: Default to diplay all data, you can choose time scale to get statistics data
product_promotion_activity_limit_times_t: Enter an integer greater than 0, the max number of times each person can participate in the same program for.
product_promotion_winning_odds_tip: Chance of Winning must be less than or equal to 100.
product_promotion_winning_odds_placehold: Enter an number less than or equal to 100
product_promotion_gift_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this gift?
product_goods_delete: Are you sure you want to delete all the goods?
product_promotion_code_count_tip: Enter a quantity no more than 100,000
product_item_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this goods?
product_category_delete: This action will meanwhile delete all the properties that are set under this category
product_category_cannot_delete_tip: Category has been used, can not be deleted
product_double_click: Click to edit the category name
product_promotion_associated_table_tip: Only the goods with promo codes assigned are shown here, not including those with coupons or lottos selected as prizes (configurable on the "New/Edit Item with Promo Codes" page), and meanwhile those already used by other promotions are disabled in this list.
product_promotion_name_tip: Promotion name must be 4-30 characters long
product_promotion_delete_confirm: The promotion related data is irreversible once this promotion is deleted
product_upload_fail: Sorry, upload fail. Please try it again.
product_upload_success: Importing is complete. {{right}} promo codes were imported and {{wrong}} failed.
product_uploading_tip: Uploading now, please wait for minute
product_property_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this property? Deleting it will result in clearing this property of the corresponding goods.
product_promocodes_error_tip: Please generate or import promo codes
product_upload_fail_sku: Product ID is different from the selected product, please check the file and upload.
product_upload_fail_zero: Upload no promo codes, maybe promo codes are same
product_goods_select_images_tip: You can select at most 5 images
product_cannot_edit_tip: The goods that have been put on shelves are not editable
product_cannot_delete_tip: The goods that have been put on shelves are not removable
product_goods_offshelves_tip: The goods that are pulled off shelves will not be displayed in the front end item list of points consumption store.
product_select_goods_onshelves_title: Select time for goods to hit shelves
product_no_select_goods: Select and add goods to points consumption store
product_goods_operation_helpinfo: The newly added goods will not hit shelves by default. Please set when to put them on shelves in the List page.
product_goods_search_tip: A quick search for what you want
product_create_cat_first: Please create categories first, then new item
product_goods_onshelve_time_safe: The scheduled time must be later than the current time
product_exchange_used_scores_tip: Please set points range right, ensure end point is not less than start point
product_codechange_redeemer_cellphone: Enter cellphone number of the redeemer
product_codechange_redeemer_cellphone_ti: Cellphone number is the key info to identify the member. Mark sure it's correct.
product_codechange_add_member_info: This redeemer is not a member currently. Click to add as a new member.
product_codechange_tags_tip: Better to add tgas for this member to make it easy to view the member info
product_codechange_check_promocode_tip: The promo codes have expired. If there are any questions, please contact customer service
product_exchange_goods_successfully: Goods redemption details sent to the member's mobile successfully
product_redemption_goods_successful_tip: Goods redeemed successfully! You can go to Redemption Records for redemption info.
product_redemption_goods_successful_titl: The system will send the message of goods redemption success as well as the details to this member
product_member_score_not_enough: Member's points is not enough, and goods cannot be redeemed
product_member_not_exist: This member was not found, and goods cannot be redeemed
product_codechange_redeemed_success: Promo codes redeemed successfully! You can redeem goods for this member now or click the "Goods Redemption" menu to redeem later!
product_redemption_codes_successful_tip: Promo codes redeemed successfully! Redeem {{totalScore}} points.
product_redemption_codes_successful_titl: The system will send promo codes redemption successful message to this member
product_exchange_codes_successfully: The system has successfully sent the promo codes redemption details to member's cellphone
product_offline_redeemer_info_tip: You can search directly by entering mobile number, name of the member or ID of the member, or make an accurate search with the member property in the format, for instance, "Resturant: Shangri-La Hotel".
product_add_code_score_tip: After redemption, the points earned will be automatically added to the member points.
product_input_code_tip: Separate promo codes with a comma, a max of 100 allowed
product_promo_code_expired_tip: Promo codes may expire and those expired are not able to be redeemed. You need to set the redemption time to make them redeemable.
product_promo_codes_exist_msg: Promo codes have already existed, Do not input again.
product_statistics_prize_redemption_volu: Trend of Daily Total Redemption Volume
product_category_property_tip: You can create a max of 20 properties
product_code_redeem_successfully: Promo codes redeemed successfully, and the message has been pushed.
product_goods_redeem_successfully: Goods redeemed successfully, and the message has been pushed.
product_receive_address_tip: Enter a detailed goods shipping address, for example, the street name, number, floor and room number, etc.
product_on_shelves_tip: The shelf of product will not be sold in this store
product_delte_shelf_goods: Are you sure you want to delete the goods
product_code_redem_total_points: Total Points from Promo Code Redemption
product_coupon_delete_title: Are you sure you want to delete the coupon?
product_coupon_receive_key: Effective from {{startTime}} days after the coupon is claimed and valid for {{endTime}} days
product_coupon_receive_current_key: Effective from 0 day after the coupon is claimed and valid for {{endTime}} days
product_coupon_sku_error: Decrease inventory should be no more than current inventory
product_create_qrcode_tip: The access to several social channels has been made. Please select the one(s) for publishing coupons.
product_coupon_cash_desc: Offer amount deduction. You can set as "￥ X Off toward any purchase of ￥ X or more".
product_coupon_coupon_desc: A "general voucher",which can be used when the above three types are unable to meet the needs.
product_coupon_gift_title_tip: Type the service or gift name to describe the offer provided by the gift coupon
product_coupon_discount_title_tip: Type the discount rate and other customized content to describe the offer provided by the discount coupon
product_coupon_cash_title_tip: Type the amount of deduction and other customized content to describe the offer provided by the cash coupon
product_coupon_coupon_title_tip: Type the service or goods name to describe the offer provided by the coupon
product_coupon_limit_tip: An upper limit on the number of coupons each user can claim.The value is "1" by default if not set
product_coupon_operation_tip_tip: Tips for users to show their coupons to the staff in stores and ask them to perform the redemption operation.
product_coupon_threshold_tip: Available for spending of how much.If not set, available for spending of any amount by default.
product_coupon_claimed_2: after the coupon is claimed and valid for
product_coupon_limit_error_tip: The quantity you type cannot be larger than the inventory. Please retype a value.
product_customer_limit: Each user can only claim {{limit}} coupon(s)
product_code_exceed_tip: A max of valid promo codes allowed is 100
product_receive_address_delete_tip: Deleting this local pickup location will result in delivery failure of certain items. Please confirm your deletion.
product_goods_pickup_tip: Please select the local pickup locations this item supports
product_goods_ship_tip: The shipping status cannot be changed once set as "Shipped".
product_not_exchange_experience: Promo codes redemption expierence is invalid
product_category_name_placeholder: Please type a category name. A max of 10 Chinese or 20 English characters is allowed
product_attribute_name_tip: A max of 10 Chinese or 20 English characters is allowed
product_category_form_tip: You can create a max of 20 properties
product_specification_tip: Combinations of goods specs, which will be regarded as unified by default if no spec is added.
product_set_price_tip: Set a price for the item when it hits shelves
product_add_specification_tip: Please type spec name. A max of 10 Chinese or English characters is allowed.
product_add_specification_value_tip: Type multiple values one after another by pressing the Enter key
product_description_empty_tip: Click "Add image" or "Add text" to edit details
product_specification_full_tip: A max of 4 specs is allowed
product_qrcode_tip: Scan QR code to view goods details via WeChat
product_add_image_tip: An image that is 480*620px wide and less than 960px high and smaller than 50KB is suggested.
product_image_full_tip: A max of 10 images is allowed
